title: Warren Haynes Band - Live At The Moody Theater - 2CD+DVD 2012
description:
In addition to his three solo discs (including 2004s acoustic Live At Bonnaroo), seven albums with the Allman Brothers and Govt Mules 16 studio and live releases, Haynes has accumulated stacks of accolades for his efforts.

They range from Grammy wins and nominations to his ranking at number 23 on Rolling Stones list of The 100 Greatest Guitarists of All Time. Haynes has played New York Citys historic Beacon Theater nearly 300 times, more than any other artist. Govt Mule has sold over two million song downloads from their own MuleTracks web site. And a wide range of stars including Garth Brooks, Gregg Allman, Phil Lesh, Little Milton, John Mayall, George Jones, Derek Trucks, Susan Tedeschi and Buckwheat Zydeco have recorded his songs in addition to the 25 songs heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s written for the Allman Brothers Band.
